评论概述: Floral design poofs on the shoulders
评论详情: This review is for the blue floral design. The pattern and material are great but it is not the same shirt as the solid colors. The others are normal style tees with ribbing down the chest. They are great. The floral poofs out like an 80s prom dress. I sent my first order back and had it replaced thinking it was a stitching error or that the wrong style had been sent, but the second order arrived the same way. It would be great for a silly 80s party but not today’s style.

评论概述: soft and feels good against my skin
评论详情: This shirt is amazingly soft, and feels so good against my skin. This is one of the softest shirts I have ever put on. I also like that they are long, and go way past your waist. when I bought the shirt, it was still cool in the mornings and at night. I would grab the top and put it on over my tee shirt, it's comfy and warm, like getting a hug from your shirt, I love it.

I ordered this black long sleeve tunic from Amazon Vine, and it has quickly become one of my favorite tops to wear these past weeks. It has a soft and lightweight fabric, which makes this shirt so comfortable to wear all day, whether I am running errands or just hanging out. The slightly loose fit gives it that relaxed vibe without looking too baggy, and the pleats on the front add a nice touch of style that dresses it up just enough.  I have worn it with jeans for a casual look, and I could easily pair it with leggings or even tuck it into a skirt when I want to dress it up a little. The long sleeves and the crewneck made it great to wear to go out at night. What I really like is that it is easy to care for, I just toss it in the wash, and it holds up well. The black color I got goes with just about anything, so I’m already thinking about getting it in another color. Overall, it is a great, comfy top that works for both casual and slightly more dressed-up looks.

This tunic top has become my go-to choice when I want something that looks stylish but feels easy to wear. The pleated design and loose fit offer a flattering silhouette, while the cinched waist provides a slimming effect. I wore it for a casual gathering with friends, and it received compliments for its elegant yet laid-back style. The fabric is soft and drapes nicely, which makes it perfect for layering or wearing on its own. It’s a piece that can easily transition from day to night, offering both comfort and style without any fuss.

I am reviewing for the light green color, it is super cute. I get compliments on the color and the fit all the time. The 5% spandex is just the right amount to get a wonderfully comfortable fit. Loose but still dressy and great for any occasion. I'll be re-ordering in the Rose color next. It does run a little bit big.
